title: [This week in Britain. No. 15. Nursery schools]
brief_description: Cinemagazine item: East End of London - one of the most densely populated areas in the world - Rachel McMillan Nursery School. Activities at the world’s first nursery school established by the McMillan sisters over fifty years before this film was made. Presented by Noelene Pritchard.
